short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The bar starts with the question: 'What is your intent?' Write your intention and it will remind you at every tab

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This is a productivity tool for staying focused through multiple tabs. 

Focus Bar sits on top of your browsing experience and prompts you to input your "intent". Every new browsing tab or window will show your intent so you can stay focused on your task.

The "close" button will close the bar for the current tab session. Alternatively you can snooze the bar for 8 hours at a time. 

Use this to STAY FOCUSED during your browsing sessions. 

Update 9/20/2024
- fixed content bar snoozing
Update 9/14/2024
- fixed bug with snoozing
